author: Chris Pugh
comment: A novel watch face, though lacking display elements like seconds and date. Those aren't necessarily important, so my only real gripe is how small it is on a round watch (or, perhaps, a higher-resolution one like my Huawei Watch.

author: Ben McCluskey
comment: Amazing simplistic design, by far my favourite. Would like the option to change to 12hr, without changing phone settings.

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: The beauty of this watch face is it's simplicity. It is my favorite so far.

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank You. In 2012 this project won Golden A Design Award. https://competition.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=27475

title: Awesome

author: Karl Silla Rantai
comment: This is how smartwatch faces should be.
title: More!
